name: Sword Dudududuel!
description:
Instructions: Slash the enemy before he slashes you!

Game Controls:
 W - move to panel on top of the player (move up)
 A  - move to panel on left of the player (move left)
 S   - move to panel on bottom of the player (move down)
 D  - move to panel on the right of the player (move right)

 J - Attack (move two panels to the right then slash the panel in front of you)
